meanings.definition: conveyancers: a person or firm that prepares documents for the transfer of property
meanings.sent1: The conveyancers helped us with the paperwork for buying our new house.
meanings.sent2: The conveyancers at the real estate office were very efficient.
meanings.sent3: The conveyancers joked that they were the wizards of property documents.
meanings.sent4: The conveyancers were like diligent bees, buzzing around the legal paperwork.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the conveyancers as the property transfer experts.

meanings.definition: conveyancers: the act of transferring property from one owner to another
meanings.sent1: The conveyancers completed the conveyancing process smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The conveyancers handled the conveyancing of the estate professionally.
meanings.sent3: The conveyancers made the property handover seem like a dance routine.
meanings.sent4: The conveyancers orchestrated the property transfer like conductors of a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The conveyancers made the property exchange feel like a seamless transition.
